title: FT/FS: HOFers and commons, Some graded, A Lot ungraded
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT/FS: HOFers and commons, Some graded, A Lot ungraded
posts.post_content:
All of these are for trade or sale.  Sorry for the scans of the graded cards.....best I can do. I'm very reasonable, so reach out to me with any questions or if you want to negotiate.

TRADES:
My T206 need list is below the pictures.  I'm close to finishing the monster, so help me out!  Also willing to trade FOR silver (bullion, eagles, 90%)

SELL:
Prices for cards in pictures below include first-class USPS shipping with tracking. Payment via pp friends preferred but will consider other means. "I'll take it" is priority.

NEGOTIABLE!!!
Seymour Batting - PSA 3 - $SOLD
Dunn (wet sheet transfer on front) - PSA 2 - $30
Mullin batting - SGC 50 - $49
Burke - SGC 40 - $31
Hartsel - SGC 20 - $21
Marquard - raw - $50
Bender trees upper - raw - $SOLD
Bender trees lower - raw - $SOLD
Kelley Old Mill (pin hole and pencil) - raw - $45
Bender no trees - raw - $55
Evers Chicago - raw - $SOLD
Wallace - BVG 1.5 - $45 - Great front
Griffith batting polar bear - SGC 10 - $SOLD

Lots of ungraded commons available (about 50) for trade or sale......values are all over the place, so make an offer. 
2 Pelty horizontals, a Pattee, plus others. I am familiar with going rates on these.....haha.

MERKLE TRADED. 
PATTEE, POWELL, CRIGER and CAMNITZ SOLD.
